:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: See you soon.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: What a lovely place you're at. Can't wait to meet you.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Moving on.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I want you to understand that you do not control this game. I do.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: And that what I do to these characters is what I see fit.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Know that this is my world. Not yours.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Now meet your friends in their more, desirable state.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: a#L

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I would've typed out your IP. But I think your friends watching wouldn't like that now, would they?

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Hello Scott. I've heard great things about you.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Your soul is as pure as they've said, correct?

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Very well then. I pray you come back soon.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Maybe return with your other name. Maybe with an underscore before it.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Ian. You've returned.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I applaud you for figuring it out. If it gave you any difficulty.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Now then. Since I've heard you dont do so well with.. Noises.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I'll refrain from making them.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Cohen. The brain behind the false Incredibox mod series.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Never thought I'd see a mind like myself present.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Ah, I've just realized.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Ah, I've just realized.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Well, Well, Well..

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: If it isn't the man himself.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: How's my world so far? Great I assume.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: You aren't her. I know you aren't.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I'll allow you to fake the identity of others. Just not her.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Farewell. Fraud.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Hello Draker.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Your username contains 'mopple'.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Sadly I cannot create your lovechild. Sinner, was it?

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Regardless, my sincerest apologies.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Hello, Lee.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I know you have a taste for anthropromorphic beings. Especially of the male kind.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I'll come up with more soon. Believe me.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Greetings, my Lord.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: You may not know me. But I am aware of your greatness.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Welcome home.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Blockhead.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Aren't you the rabbit dating the Blockhead?

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: I don't mean that in an offensive way.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Evacuate the premises.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Hello, Chrono. I enjoy your work.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Greetings, Ashley. How are you today?

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Jerk to Travis.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Hello, Overbyte. I enjoy your creations.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: You're afraid. Aren't you? Let me see where you are.

mutation.proccode: Add text and Say: %s positions and size %s %s %s %s

:!?BMMdCt/MbnW?D.m8Q: Hello.
